newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Fifteen die after train hits Russian school bus.
newsitem.headline: Fifteen die after train hits Russian school bus.

text.p: Fifteen children were killed and 14 injured on Thursday when a train struck a school bus at a level crossing in Russia's southern Rostov region, the Ministry for Emergency Situations said.

The ministry said the accident occurred early in the morning, adding that a team of doctors was on stand-by to fly to the region if local hospitals needed assistance. The driver of the bus was also hurt.
Accidents on unguarded level crossings are common in Russia. There was no immediate indication of whether the Rostov crossing was unguarded or how Thursday's accident happened.
